class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Axes
class.description: Displays an axis at the Target Frame's origin. More Information.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Camera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. More Information.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Grid
class.description: Displays a grid along the ground plane, centered at the origin of the target frame of reference.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/MoveCamera
class.description: Drag the mouse with left, middle, or right buttons to change your viewpoint.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/PublishPoint
class.description: Allows you to click on a point and publish it as a PointStamped message.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Select
class.description: Drag with the left button to select objects in the 3D scene. Hold the Alt key to change viewpoint as in the Move tool.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/SetGoal
class.description: Publish a goal pose for the robot. After one use, reverts to default tool.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Measure
class.description: Click onto two locations to measure their distance.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/FocusCamera
class.description: Click onto any object to focus the camera there.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/SetInitialPose
class.description: Publish an initial pose for the robot. After one use, reverts to default tool.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Interact
class.description: Interact with interactive markers. Mouse actions not on interactive markers fall back to moving the camera.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/FPS
class.description: Control the camera like in a First Person Shooter game: drag left to look left, etc.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/Orbit
class.description: Makes it easy to move around a given point in space, looking at it from any angle.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/TopDownOrtho
class.description: Orthographic projection, seen from the top.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/XYOrbit
class.description: Makes it easy to move around a given point on the XY plane, looking at it from any angle.

class.name: rviz_default_plugins/ThirdPersonFollower
class.description: Follow a target frame and turn the viewing direction with the yaw of the target frame.
